content: Hey everyone! How was your weekend?
Pretty good! Went hiking with my family. Weather was perfect.
Nice! I mostly stayed in and caught up on some reading.
I went to that new brewery downtown. Highly recommend it!
So about the Q4 project deadline... are we still on track?
I think we're in good shape. The API integration is about 80% complete.
That's great news. What about the frontend work?
Frontend is done except for the dashboard widgets. Should finish those by Wednesday.
user_4, do you need any help with the widgets? I can jump in if needed.
Thanks! I might take you up on that. Let me see how far I get today.
We should also schedule a testing session before the release.
Good idea. How about Friday afternoon?
Friday works for me.
Anyone hungry? Thinking about ordering lunch.
Yeah! What are you thinking?
Maybe Thai or Mexican? Open to suggestions.
There's a good taco place that delivers - Taco Fiesta. Their burritos are huge.
I'm down for tacos! user_3, want to coordinate an order?
Sure, I'll create a shared cart and send the link.
Perfect, thanks!
Quick question - can someone review my pull request when you get a chance? It's the authentication refactor.
I can take a look. What's the PR number?
It's PR #247. Main changes are in the auth middleware and user session handling.
user_2, I'm seeing some issues with the token refresh logic. Are you using the new JWT library?
Yes, I upgraded to v3.2. What issues are you seeing?
The refresh tokens aren't being validated correctly. They're expiring too early.
Hmm, I think I might have misconfigured the expiration time. Let me check the docs.
I had the same issue last month. You need to set the refresh_expiry parameter separately from the access_expiry.
user_4, do you remember what values you used?
I set access_expiry to 15 minutes and refresh_expiry to 7 days. Worked perfectly after that.
That makes sense. I'll update the config and push a new commit. Thanks!
Also, you might want to add some unit tests for the token refresh flow. I noticed there aren't any in the PR.
Good catch. I'll add those before merging.
By the way, has anyone seen the new office renovation plans? They're putting in a coffee bar!
Really? That's awesome! When is that happening?
I think construction starts next month. They sent an email about it last week.
